document_data.mainbody:
Big Huido was a smuggler ringleader who worked with the infamous Guild in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
He was a hin with a close-cut blond hair and brown eyes. The halflings face was streaked with numerous long scars. Huido armed himself with two simple daggers.
In the , Big Huido worked with a gand of smugglers Galem Meats, Lo Blank, and Jezzy Topps, transporting weapons, drugs, and firewine into Baldurs Gate. The shipments were well defended and all were released into the hands of the members of the Guild only. One such shipment during the Absolute crisis was a chest containing essence of ether, dream mist, silkroot, and terazulâ€”all illegal substances in the city.
